thread.title: SNC-Lavalin's quarterly profit falls 13 pct on higher costs

title: SNC-Lavalin's quarterly profit falls 13 pct on higher costs
text:
May 3, 2018 / 12:01 PM / a few seconds ago SNC-Lavalin's quarterly profit falls 13 percent on higher costs Reuters Staff 1 Min Read
(Reuters) - Canadian construction and engineering firm SNC-Lavalin Group Inc ( SNC.TO ) on Thursday reported a 13 percent fall in quarterly profit, hurt by higher costs.
The companyâ€™s net income attributable to shareholders fell to C$78.1 million ($60.7 million), or 44 Canadian cents per share, in the first quarter ended March 31, from C$89.7 million, or 60 Canadian cent per share, a year earlier.
Revenue rose to C$2.37 billion from C$1.79 billion. Reporting by Akshara P in Bengaluru; Editing by Maju Samuel
